Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single Item that exists in the shop.
    Since:
    Feb. 12, 2020
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    P. Link

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean alreadyOrdered
      Whether this item has been ordered yet on this order.
      private int id
      Represents the ID of the Item
      private static int MINIMUM_QUANTITY
      Minimum quantity before ordering more.
      private java.lang.String name
      Represents the name/description of the Item
      private static int ORDER_QUANTITY
      How many of this item to should be remaining after an order.
      private double price
      Represents the price of the Item
      private int quantity
      Represents the current quantity of the Item
      private Supplier supplier
      Represents the Supplier of the Item

      Creates a new item, with all properties of each item.

      • ORDER_QUANTITY

        private static final int ORDER_QUANTITY
        How many of this item to should be remaining after an order. Note that different values were picked for these in the reference implementation video.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MINIMUM_QUANTITY

        private static final int MINIMUM_QUANTITY
        Minimum quantity before ordering more. Note that different values were picked for these in the reference implementation video.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(int id,
            java.lang.String name,
            int quantity,
            double price,
            Supplier supplier)
        Creates a new item, with all properties of each item.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the item
        name - The name/description of the item
        quantity - The current quantity of the item
        price - The current price of the item
        supplierID - The supplier ID of the item (linked to a supplier)

    • Method Detail

                       java.lang.String name,
                       int quantity,
                       double price,
                       Supplier supplier)

        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the item
        name - The name/description of the item
        quantity - The current quantity of the item
        price - The current price of the item
        supplierID - The supplier ID of the item (linked to a supplier)

        Gets the item's quantity.

        The Item's ID.

        Gets the item's name.

        public Supplier getSupplier()

      • generateOrderLine

        public OrderLine generateOrderLine()
        Generates an OrderLine for this item, if it is required. Otherwise, returns null.
        Returns:
        The generated OrderLine, or null if an order is not required.
        Since:
        Feb 16, 2020

      • decreaseItemQuantity

        public boolean decreaseItemQuantity()
        Decreases the quantity of this item. Will not decrease quantity below zero.
        Returns:
        Whether the decrease succeeded (i.e. whether or not there were any left before this was called).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts all main elements of the item into a String representation.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        String representation of the Item.
